column1: Beef or pork tapeworm infection is an infection with the tapeworm parasite found in beef or pork.
Adults and children with pork tapeworm can infect themselves if they have poor hygiene.
Tapeworm infection usually does not cause any symptoms.
Some people may have abdominal discomfort.
The drug of choice for tapeworm infections is praziquantel.
Infection of the brain (neurocysticercosis) can cause seizures and other nervous system problems.
